info.title: Businessmap
info.description: Businessmap is the most flexible software platform for outcomes-driven enterprise agility. The unmatched functionality consolidates multiple tools into one, enabling affordable deployment at scale, visibility across all projects/portfolios, and alignment on goals, to deliver quality work faster. The Businessmap connector can be used to reflect changes in external tools (e.g. issue trackers, email, time tracking tools, etc.) inside your Kanban cards.

post.description: (Deprecated) Move a card (Task or Initiative, if possible) to a column.
(Deprecated) Log time to a card. The time is logged in seconds.

get.description: (Deprecated) Get all workflows from a given board.

post.description:
Triggers for any action on the board. Use Control/Condition or Control/Switch to manage flow for different triggers. Here is partial list of supported event types: "Card created", "Card moved", "Card details changed", "Card deleted", "Card blocked" 

 Your next step after the trigger should be "Get Card By ID" so you can take all card details 

Use Control/Condition on author ID in bi-direction integrations to prevent loops
Get all users for a board. Used internally.

get.description: Get all block reasons within the account. Can filter by board. Used internally.
Get all boards within the account. Used internally.
Get all columns for a specified board. Used internally.
Get all lanes for a specified board. Used internally.
Get all types within the account. Used internally.
Get all workflows for a specified board. Used internally.
Get a list with all attachments for a specified card.
Get all templates within the account. Used internally.
Get all custom fields within the account. Used internally.
Get all values for a specified custom field. Used internally.
Get card details by its internal ID.
Get all cards from a selected board. The response contains up to 200 cards. For more than 200 cards, please use paging.

post.description: Create a card in a board of your choice. To set custom fields, stickers and tags use in combination with "Update Card".

get.description: Find card by custom card id. If multiple cards are found, only the first one will be returned. Use Board parameter to filter search by boards.

patch.description: Update the properties of a card (Title, Description, Priority, etc.). If getting a timeout or API limit reached errors, try breaking down the setting of custom fields, stickers and tags into separate actions.
Move a card to new column, lane, workflow or board.
Set the value of a custom field.
Discard a card or restore a previously discarded card.
Add card to archive, or extract it from archive.
Link a card to an existing card.
Remove a link between two cards.

post.description: Create a new subtask of a card or initiative.
Add a comment to a card or initiative.

get.description: Download an attachment from a card. File content is returned as base64 encoded string.

post.description: Upload an attachment to a card.

get.description: Get all stickers within the account. Can filter by board. Used internally.
Get all tags within the account. Can filter by board. Used internally.

patch.description: Add tag(s) to a card or remove assigned tag(s) from a card
Add sticker(s) to a card or remove assigned sticker(s) from a card

get.description: Get the name of an object based on its ID. Helper function used when you want to get the name of the board, workflow, column etc. based on its ID
